department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Cinema and the Auteur
course.meeting_text: Tu., 11:30-1, and weekly film screenings W., 1-3
course.description: Studies development of auteur theory in French film and criticism. Readings include Cahiers du cinema, Bazin, Deleuze, Godard, and Foucault. Viewings include Renoir, American and Italian auteurs, and post-new wave cinemas.
course.notes: //This course has an additional weekly film screening, Wednesday, 1-3pm.
